thread.title: Facebook's Mark Zuckerberg prepares for a grilling in Brussels

title: Facebook's Mark Zuckerberg prepares for a grilling in Brussels
text:
Facebook's Mark Zuckerberg prepares for a grilling in Brussels Tuesday, May 22, 2018 - 01:02
CEO Mark Zuckerberg will meet the leaders of the European Parliament for a private meeting to answer questions about the improper use of millions of users' data by a political consultancy, as pressure on the company's protection of data continues. Anna Bevan reports
CEO Mark Zuckerberg will meet the leaders of the European Parliament for a private meeting to answer questions about the improper use of millions of users' data by a political consultancy, as pressure on the company's protection of data continues. Anna Bevan reports //reut.rs/2IBkuOO
